body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY!

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).

If the matter is security related, please disclose it privately via https://kubernetes.io/security/.
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

/kind bug

**What happened**:

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/test/e2e/kubectl/kubectl.go#L805-L807

At e2e test for kubectl above, success scenario is `replicas` key is not contained in result of `view-last-applied`.
But test failure message is `Missing "replicas": 2 in kubectl view-last-applied`, in spite of `replicas` key is contained.

**What you expected to happen**:

When test for absence of `replicas` key failed, correct message is `Presenting "replicas": 2 in kubectl view-last-applied`.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"13+", GitVersion:"v1.13.0-alpha.0.1057+8f906fefae84be-dirty", GitCommit:"8f906fefae84bebf5fe1ba60a4f2c8b5f1a6d775", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2018-09-05T07:30:12Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"13+", GitVersion:"v1.13.0-alpha.0.1057+8f906fefae84be-dirty", GitCommit:"8f906fefae84bebf5fe1ba60a4f2c8b5f1a6d775", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2018-09-05T07:30:12Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:none, hack/local-up-cluster.sh
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):16.04.5 LTS (Xenial Xerus)
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):4.4.0-124-generic
- Install tools:hack/local-up-cluster.sh
- Others:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG CLI.
labels.name: sig/cli

title: Wrong message of e2e test "apply set/view last-applied" about kubectl
